products.name: Everdure CUBE Portable Charcoal Grill - Black - HBCUBEBUS
products.description:
Portable & Compact

Lightweight steel & cool to touch handles make Everdure's Cube in Black easy to transport. It's the ideal camp stove for outdoor grilling. Use it with family & friends as a tailgate grill or take it to the beach as your portable BBQ.

Grill On Any Surface

With an integrated base to protect any surface, use the Cube barbeque grill anywhere. The built-in heat protection shield makes it the perfect tabletop charcoal grill, tailgating grill, RV grill, or travel grill.

All-In-One Design

This charcoal BBQ has an integrated storage tray for accessories or food. It also includes a bamboo cutting board to prepare meat, fish, veggies & more. Two safety latches fasten all of these items into one small portable grill.

Easy to Clean

The charcoal tray, fire box, & removable grill rack make cleaning the Cube easy. There is no need for gas or propane with this portable camping charcoal grill. It is designed with high quality construction intended for lifetime use.

Ample Cooking Area

This mini grill has 115 sq. inches of grilling surface to provide plenty of space on your compact grill. Grill 6 small burgers or 3 medium steaks on the Cube portable stove.

Dimensions: 9.05 H x 13.67 D x 16.73 W.

products.description:
Ready, set, grill on the go! The Weber Q 1200 portable gas BBQ grill offers 189 square inches of cooking space to create the grilled foods you love anytime, anywhere. Weber Q gas grills are perfect for tailgating, camping or small spaces like apartment balconies. With the push of a button, the grill ignites quickly and easily. The durable stainless steel burner produces 8,500 BTUs and the infinite control burner valve allows you to set it to the precise temperature you need with an easy-to-use knob. This Weber portable gas grill features two folding work tables so you have space to spread out, each with convenient tool hooks. It also features a tall cast aluminum lid which is designed to expand your grilling area for larger items. The Weber Q 1200 also features a built-in lid thermometer and a two-piece, porcelain-enameled cast iron cooking grate that heats evenly across its surface. It also features a green lid, cast aluminum body with drip ducts and a sturdy glass-reinforced nylon frame and handles. A removable grease catch pan is included to make clean-up easy. This Weber Q operates on a 1 pound disposable propane cylinder (not included). An optional 20-lb tank adapter hose is available as an accessory for those times you need to feed larger groups. The Magma Original Size Marine Kettle Gas Grill is constructed with 304, 18-8 mirror-polished stainless steel with marine grade qualities that add superior corrosion resistance and is less prone to rust. Designed for the grill master on the open water, the Kettle is ideal for grilling up some burgers or dogs with your pals or, if you are feeling fancy, even searing a steak. Worried about blow-outs on the windy seas? Magma has you covered! The turbo venturi tube and stainless steel burner feature a windproof design that prevents blow outs. The tube also swivels, which adjusts the control valve to whatever setting you need. The Marine Kettle also features a balanced hinged lid which could double as a windshield when things get gusty. The included round rail mount is also constructed from 18-8 stainless steel and 356 anodized aluminum to endure the marine elements. The quick-disconnect design allows for easy removal and leaves no hardware on the rail. Designed with quality and durability in mind, the original Marine Kettle helps you combine your loves of fresh BBQ and sunny days above the waves.
The regulator uses a standard 1 pound propane canister (not included).

products.name: Blaze 21-Inch Portable 1500 Watt Electric Grill - BLZ-ELEC-21
products.description:
The Blaze Portable Electric Grill allows you to enjoy quality grilling in more places than ever. This 21-inch portable electric grill is built with a 304 stainless steel body and features a water-resistant design for safe use outdoors. The 274 square inch cooking surface reaches up to 749 degrees Fahrenheit and is evenly heated by a full-sized 1,500 watt heating element. 16-gauge 304 stainless steel flame tamers help prevent flare ups, evenly distribute heat, and vaporize drippings for extra flavor. Heavy-duty 9mm triangular stainless steel cooking rods allow for greater heat transfer to create impressive sear marks. A removable warming rack lets you keep bread and other foods heated while you grill. The heating element has a hinged design and can be lifted out, while an easy pull-out drip tray collects drippings for easy cleanup. The 304 stainless steel grill hood is double-lined to protect the outer layer from heat discoloration, keeping your Blaze grill looking shiny and new for years of use. Adjustable feet allow for steady placement on uneven surfaces. Safety features include a built-in 60-minute timer with automatic shut-off, and a heavy-gauge 7.5 foot power cord with built-in GFCI breaker. A dedicated 20 AMP circuit is recommended for best performance, however a dedicated 15 AMP circuit is also acceptable. This product is ETL certified.

products.name: Victory 3-Burner Propane Gas Grill With Infrared Side Burner - BBQ-VCT3BSB-LP
products.description:
BBQGuys Exclusive!

Merging lasting materials with unrivaled performance among its peers, the Victory propane gas grill is ready to take on all challengers and help you Taste Victory. Nearly every component in the grill body is built using 18-gauge stainless steel, the kind of durable construction you need to emerge victorious from every BBQ and savor the moments that matter.

Full-Featured Grill at an Affordable Price

The double-lined hood, side walls, and fire box seal in heat, leading to steadier temperatures throughout the grill. Between the main grilling area and secondary warming rack, the 7-mm round steel cooking rods offer 626 square inches of cooking space; this is more than any in-class competitor can claim. Below the grill grates is a series of Triple Ridge Flame Tamers, which are uniquely shaped to spread even heat, keep flare-ups to a minimum, and afford even greater protection to the already-durable stainless steel burners. By centering the burners directly below the central ridges of the flame tamers, the Victory gas grill wicks drippings straight to a slide-out, full-width drip tray that makes cleanup incredibly simple.

3 Burners plus an Infrared Searing Side Burner

Each burner in this freestanding gas grill packs 12,000 BTUs, as does the infrared side burner that quickly preheats for steakhouse-style searing. Grillers seeking victory will also be glad to see a hood-mounted thermometer, an indispensable feature for keeping your eye on temperatures, and a battery-free piezo ignitor that reliably lights the burners.

A Best-in-Class Grill Cart

The Victory freestanding grill cart is fully enclosed for safe storage and a more finished look, while the left side shelf provides convenient prep space and beer placement for those who partake. Throw in 8 built-in tool hooks, heavy-duty locking casters for mobility and stability, and more than enough storage space for a propane tank, and this grill has features that go toe-to-toe with the best of them. So, are you ready to Taste Victory? Take winning BBQ into your own hands with the Victory gas grill.

All-Stainless Steel Design

For top-of-class quality, the Victory gas grills exterior is constructed entirely from durable, corrosion-resistant stainless steel.

Powerful Side Sear Burner

The 12,000-BTU infrared side sear burner quickly and intensely sears up to 2 steaks at once without taking up main grilling space.

Largest-In-Class Grilling Area

Victorys 464 square inches of main grilling space are the most in class, with 162 square inches of secondary space on the top grate.

Triple Ridge Flame Tamers

Uniquely engineered to evenly distribute high heat, greatly reduce flare-ups, and better protect the stainless steel burners below.

Fully Enclosed Storage Cart

As sturdy as it is spacious, the Victory grill cart offers secure storage for propane tanks and more while providing a finished look.

Convenient Tool Hooks

A set of 8 grilling accessory hooks 4 on each side shelf allows grillers to keep tongs, spatulas, and more within arms reach.

products.name: Magma Del Mar Residential Propane Gas Grill - DM10-016LP
products.description:
The freestanding Del Mar propane gas grill from Magma brings the same quality and efficiency as their marine grills into your back yard. This gold medal winning grill has been named Best Pedestal Propane Barbeque by the American Culinary Institute, and the reasons why are clear. 100 percent 304 stainless steel construction stands the test of time, and the mirror finish outshines other backyard grills. The double-lined lid and bowl do an excellent job at holding in heat, while also keeping the outside cooler and protecting against discoloration from heat. A cast stainless steel Stay-Cool handle lets you safely open and close the lid, which is perfectly balanced so as not to slam shut. Magma uses a patented design to create efficient convection cooking, providing the hottest temperatures while consuming the least amount of fuel. The Turbo Burner design creates a consistently hot blue flame by premixing air and fuel, producing up to 10,700 BTUs. A radiant plate helps to evenly distribute heat over the 201 sq. inch cooking surface as well as reduce flareups, extending the life of your grill. The hide-away control panel contains the flame control knob and push-button piezoelectric ignition, giving the grill a streamlined appearance when not in use. Adjustable feet on the base keep the grill level and safe. The grill comes equipped to use 1 lb propane canisters, and the regulator is mounted on a swiveling receptacle to make access even easier. It is shipped fully assembled - simply hook up a propane canister, turn it on, and start grilling. The internal components are lightweight and easily disassembled for cleaning.

products.name: Weber GENESIS E-315 Propane Gas Grill - Black- 1500010
products.description:
The GENESIS E-315 brings performance, size, and beauty to your backyard. The Weber Crafted porcelain enameled cooking grates provide 513 square inches of cooking area, and the warming rack gives you an additional 127.5 square inches for a total grilling area of 640.5 square inches. The removable drip pan attaches to the grease tray for seamless cleanup. Looks aren't everything, but they sure help. The Weber GENESIS E-315 gas grill sports a revamped control panel, starting with a slight angle for modern aesthetics and ease of use. The burner knobs follow suit, swapping the plastic construction from Weber Genesis II for metallicized knobs that lend a premium feel, not to mention greater durability. As a bonus, each knob is notched with small-spaced tick marks for a more precise flame control. That brings us to the T-bar handle, which is shaped for easy gripping, opening, and closing from any angle. Weber reimagined everything for the new GENESIS grills, all the way down to the wheels. They've been upgraded to metal, rubber tread casters, as opposed to the pair of plastic locking casters. The rubber tread guarantees smooth transport, sturdier materials improve longevity, and the push-down lock mechanism lets you secure your grill in place with minimal effort. Any Weber warranty, coupled with the company's outstanding track record of customer service, brings major peace of mind for backyard grillers. Weber extended their limited warranty to 12 years on the new Genesis grills, as opposed to a 10-year period for Genesis II. Now THAT is peace of mind.

products.name: Everdure FURNACE Gen 2 3 Burner Propane Grill w/ Stand - Orange - E3G3O
Broil King Baron 420 Pro Shadow 4 Burner Propane Grill - Black - 674114
Weber Genesis E-325 Propane Gas Grill w/ Sear Zone - Black - 1500533
products.description:
Enjoy outdoor cooking excellence with a brand that has been trusted by generations for its high quality, great value and long-lasting craftsmanship. The Weber Genesis E-325 delivers just that with its extra-large sear zone and reliable burner system that effectively distributes heat for even cooking. FLAVORIZER Bars under the porcelain-enameled cooking grates both prevent flare-ups and produce flavorful smoke that infuses your food. Its compatibility with the Weber Crafted® Outdoor Kitchen Collection allows you the freedom to experiment with different cooking styles. Available in natural gas or liquid propane, so you can conveniently experience Weber's best in your backyard.

Experience Consistent Heat With PureBlu Burner Technology

The Genesis E-325's PureBlu burner system features 3 unique, tapered burner tubes that generate consistent pressure and deliver even heat across the 513 square inches of grilling surface. That's 3 burners at 13,000 BTU each, for a total of 39,000 BTUs for efficient power. Flames are directed above the raised gas ports, while food debris falls below, minimizing clogging and ensuring the grill lights every time.

This innovative design not only helps maintain reliable ignition but also contributes to longer burner life and reduced maintenance over time. Whether you're searing steaks or slow-cooking ribs, you'll enjoy steady, high-performance heat across the entire grill.

Achieve Restaurant-Quality Sear Marks With Porcelain Grates

Porcelain-enameled, cast-iron cooking grates retain heat for intense searing that results in restaurant-quality sear marks. The porcelain coating prevents sticking and rust, making cleanup easy while also extending the life of your grill grates. These durable grates distribute heat evenly across the cooking surface, helping to eliminate hot spots and ensure consistent results. Sear with confidence, knowing your food will come off the grill with a perfect finish and rich, caramelized flavor.

Enhance Flavors Naturally With FLAVORIZER Bars

FLAVORIZER Bars protect your Genesis E-325's burners from grease, distribute heat evenly across the grill surface, and turn drippings into flavorful smoke that enhances your food. Made from quality stainless steel, these bars are designed for lasting durability. By vaporizing juices before they reach the flame, they help prevent flare-ups while adding that unmistakable grilled taste. They're also easy to clean and simple to replace, making them a convenient upgrade for any backyard chef.

Simplify Cleanup With an Efficient Grease Management System

All the fun of cooking delicious outdoor meals without the hassle of a difficult cleanup. Weber's grease management system, with a pull-out grease tray, is located directly under the cookbox and slides out for quick and easy disposal. The system is designed to catch drippings efficiently, helping to prevent flare-ups and keep your grill cleaner between uses. It's a smart solution that lets you spend less time scrubbing and more time enjoying the meal.

Expand Your Culinary Options With Weber Crafted® Accessories

The Genesis E-325 is compatible with the Weber Crafted® Outdoor Kitchen Collection. Roast, bake, sear, steam and even stir-fry by simply replacing the standard grate with any of the custom-fit grillware! The Weber Crafted® frame and grillware are sold separately, so do not forget to add them to your purchase if you want to wield virtually limitless culinary power in your backyard. From wood-fired pizza to sizzling fajitas and delicate seafood, this innovative system opens the door to dishes you never thought possible on a gas grill. With Weber Crafted®, your backyard becomes your favorite new kitchen.

Keep Essentials Within Reach on Spacious Side Tables

Fitted with two sturdy side tables, you'll enjoy plenty of space to prep, organize and plate. In other words, everything is within arm's reach - including tools, which can be hung on the side-attached hooks. Whether you're flipping burgers or slicing vegetables, you'll appreciate the convenience of having a dedicated surface for every step. These side tables are built to handle the heat of cooking and the weight of your go-to gear, making your outdoor setup feel more like a fully equipped kitchen.

Maintain Food Temperature With a Convenient Warming Rack

A sturdy warming rack allows you to instantly go from direct to indirect heat, so you can keep foods warm, toast buns, or even grill smaller food items while the main course finishes grilling below. It's perfect for keeping cooked food at serving temperature without overcooking. The elevated position also frees up space on the main grates, giving you even more room to multitask like a real pro.

Enjoy Long-Term Reliability With a 12-Year Warranty

Weber backs the Genesis E-325 with a 12-year limited warranty, giving you peace of mind with every cookout. From the cookbox to the lid assembly and burner tubes, key components are covered to ensure years of reliable performance. This long-term protection speaks to Weber's confidence in the durability and craftsmanship of their grills. It's a commitment that lets you focus on grilling - not worrying about what happens if something goes wrong.

products.name: Weber Genesis S-335 Propane Gas Grill w/ Sear Zone & Side Burner - Stainless Steel - 1500537
products.description:
Enjoy outdoor cooking excellence with a brand that has been trusted by generations for its high quality, great value and long-lasting craftsmanship. The Weber Genesis S-335 delivers just that with a premium design featuring a reliable burner system that effectively distributes heat for even cooking. FLAVORIZER Bars under the porcelain-enameled cooking grates both prevent flare-ups and produce flavorful smoke that infuses your food. Its compatibility with the Weber Crafted® Outdoor Kitchen Collection allows you the freedom to experiment with different cooking styles. Available in natural gas or liquid propane, so you can conveniently experience Weber's best in your backyard.

Sear Multiple Steaks With the Extra-Large Sear Zone

The Weber Genesis S-335 features an extra-large sear zone designed to deliver restaurant-quality results right in your backyard. This high-heat area lets you cook multiple steaks at once, creating bold, flavorful sear marks with ease. Whether you're hosting a weekend cookout or just craving a perfectly charred burger, the expanded sear zone gives you the power and space to do it all. It heats up fast and maintains consistent temperatures, so you can focus on grilling like a pro without missing a beat.

Enjoy Even Heat Distribution With PureBlu Burners

The PureBlu burner system in the Genesis S-335 features 3 unique, tapered burner tubes that generate consistent pressure and deliver even heat across the 513 square inches of grilling surface. That's 3 burners at 13,000 BTU each, for a total of 39,000 BTUs for efficient power. Flames are directed above the raised gas ports, while food debris falls below, minimizing clogging and ensuring the grill lights every time.

This burner system not only helps maintain reliable ignition but also contributes to longer burner life and reduced maintenance over time. Whether you're searing steaks or slow-cooking ribs, you'll enjoy steady, high-performance heat across the entire grill.

Enhance Flavors With Stainless Steel FLAVORIZER Bars

FLAVORIZER Bars protect your Genesis S-335's burners from grease, distribute heat evenly across the grill surface, and turn drippings into flavorful smoke that enhances your food. Made from quality stainless steel, these bars are designed for lasting durability. By vaporizing juices before they reach the flame, they help prevent flare-ups while adding that unmistakable grilled taste. They're also easy to clean and simple to replace, making them a convenient upgrade for any backyard chef.

Simplify Cleanup With the Grease Management System

You can now enjoy delicious outdoor meals without the hassle of difficult cleanup, thanks to Weber's grease management system. A pullout grease tray is located directly under the cookbox and slides out for quick, easy disposal. This efficient design helps reduce flare-ups and keeps your grill operating at its best. That means more time grilling and spending time out back with friends and family, and less time cleaning up.

Expand Your Culinary Options With Side Burner and Warming Rack

The side burner on the Weber Genesis S-335 expands your outdoor cooking possibilities. Conveniently cook sauces, sauté vegetables or simply boil a pot of water - whatever you would normally have to run inside for is now within arm's reach. Plus, in addition to multitasking, a side burner offers temperature control for delicate dishes that need more precise heat than the grill surface can accommodate.

The warming rack allows you to quickly switch from direct to indirect heat, so you can keep foods warm, toast buns, or even grill smaller food items while the main course finishes grilling below. It's perfect for keeping cooked food at serving temperature - and do so without overcooking. The elevated position also frees up space on the main grates, giving you even more room to multitask like a real pro.

Maximize Storage With the Built-In Grill Locker

A built-in grill locker adds convenience, organization, and protection to your outdoor cooking space. It provides a dedicated spot to store essential tools like tongs, spatulas, and grill brushes, so everything you need is always nearby. By keeping gear tucked away and protected from the elements, it helps reduce wear and tear while keeping your grilling area clean and clutter-free. It also saves you trips back and forth to the kitchen, making it easier to grill on a whim. For a more streamlined, ready-to-cook setup, a built-in grill locker is a smart, space-saving addition.

Upgrade Your Grilling With Weber Crafted® Compatibility

The Genesis S-335 is compatible with the Weber Crafted® Outdoor Kitchen Collection. Roast, bake, sear, steam and even stir-fry by simply replacing the standard grate with any of the custom-fit grillware! The Weber Crafted® frame and grillware are sold separately, so do not forget to add them to your purchase if you want to wield virtually limitless culinary power in your backyard. From wood-fired pizza to sizzling fajitas and delicate seafood, this innovative system opens the door to dishes you never thought possible on a gas grill. With Weber Crafted®, your backyard becomes your favorite new kitchen.

Benefit from Long-Term Durability With Generous Warranties

Weber backs the Genesis S-335 with a 12-year limited warranty, giving you peace of mind with every cookout. From the cookbox to the lid assembly and burner tubes, key components are covered to ensure years of reliable performance. This long-term protection speaks to Weber's confidence in the durability and craftsmanship of their grills. It's a commitment that lets you focus on grilling - not worrying about what happens if something goes wrong.

Sear multiple steaks on the extra-large sear zone
Spacious grill locker keeps bulky grillware and tools organized and within reach
Side burner adds versatile cooking space for sauces, sides, and more
Pairs with Weber Crafted® custom cookware to provide limitless versatility

Plus, the removable warming rack is an ideal place to keep bread and other food heated while you grill. As far as warranties go, it's hard to beat Blazes usual best-in-class, lifetime warranty but that didn't stop them from tacking on a 3-year, multi-user warranty that covers commercial settings like apartment complexes and condos.

products.name: MHP JNR4DD Natural Gas Grill With Stainless Steel Shelves And Stainless Grids On Stainless Cart
Weber Genesis E-435 Propane Gas Grill w/ Sear Zone & Side Burner - Black - 36410001
products.description:
Made in the USA with globally-sourced parts

Introducing the newly designed GENESIS E-435 Propane grill - the biggest grilling innovation in decades, that creates a full backyard culinary experience.

Upgraded Sear Zone, Prep & Serve Table, & More

The GENESIS E-435 grill allows you to prep, sear, and serve everything outside, where the party is. The newly designed GENESIS gas grill features our largest and hottest sear zone, with secondary cooking grate so that the main course and sides are all grilled and served at the same time. Once your food is ready, easily transfer it to the large prep & serve table, making for a seamless prep-to-serve grilling experience. The grease management system got a facelift as well: the removable drip pan is now attached to the grease tray for seamless cleanup, with an included scraper just for good measure.

Updated Control Panel: Cleaner Look, Better Precision

Looks aren't everything, but they sure help. The newly designed Weber GENESIS E-435 gas grill sports a revamped control panel, starting with a slight angle for modern aesthetics and ease of use. The burner knobs follow suit, swapping the plastic construction from Weber Genesis II for metallicized knobs that lend a premium feel, not to mention greater durability. As a bonus, each knob is notched with small-spaced tick marks for more precise flame control. That brings us to the T-bar handle, which is shaped for easy gripping, opening, and closing from any angle. And speaking of angles, the T-handles 90-degree corners enhance the modern look of Weber GENESIS gas grills.

4 Stainless Steel Burners

Get 48,000 BTUs of surface grilling power for a 646 square inch main grilling area. That's big enough to grill 28 burgers at a time!

Side Burner

Saute vegetables, boil corn, or heat up sauces with the 12,000 BTU side burner.

Taller, Bolder Grill Lid

Weber increased the height of these grill lids, a welcome change that goes beyond pure aesthetics. New GENESIS grills can fit rotisseries up to 10 in diameter without removing the top grate. It seems like a small detail, but it's just one more way the next generation of Weber GENESIS grills improve your outdoor cooking experience.

The Ultimate Versatility of WEBER CRAFTED Grillware

At this point, it would be fair to wonder if there was anything the Weber GENESIS E-435 propane grill is incapable of doing. Well, we have some big news on that front: compatibility with WEBER CRAFTED Outdoor Kitchen Collection grillware allows you to cook food never thought possible on a gas grill. Roast, bake, sear, steam, and even stir-fry by simply replacing the standard grate with any of the custom-fit grillware! And with the Weber GENESIS E-435 gas grill, you are already one step closer to the full backyard culinary experience thanks to the frame kit being built in (though the grillware itself is sold separately).

Intergated Grill Locker

A solution to all your grilling storage needs, the grill locker fits WEBER CRAFTED grillware, as well as your large grilling tools

Upgraded Caster Wheels

Weber reimagined everything for the new GENESIS grills, all the way down to the wheels. They've been upgraded to metal, rubber tread casters, as opposed to the pair of plastic locking casters on Genesis II grills. The rubber tread guarantees smooth transport, sturdier materials improve longevity, and the push-down lock mechanism lets you secure your grill in place with minimal effort.

Longer Warranty

Any Weber warranty, coupled with the company's outstanding track record of customer service, brings major peace of mind for backyard grillers. That said, Weber extended their limited warranty to 12 years on the new GENESIS grills, as opposed to a 10-year period for Genesis II. Now THAT's peace of mind!


Weber GENESIS E-435 FAQ

How big is the Weber GENESIS E-435 gas grill?

The E-435 is 68.5-in wide with both shelves up, 27-in deep, and 48.5-in high. It weighs 220 lbs. The main cooking grid is 34 x 19 inches.

When did the GENESIS E-435 grill come out?

The latest line of GENESIS grills was released early in 2022.

Does the GENESIS line replace the old Genesis II grills?

It does! The Genesis II grills have all been discontinued, and have been replaced by the current line of GENESIS grills.

Can the Weber GENESIS E-435 propane grill be converted to natural gas?

No, but fortunately there's a version of the E-435 for natural gas.

products.name: Camp Chef Woodwind Pro 36-Inch Pellet Grill - PG36WWSB
products.description:
The Camp Chef Woodwind 36 Pro WiFi grill makes it easier to cook outdoors. Period. The combination of advanced features and smartphone monitoring and control gives you power to control the smoke and heat, and keeps you posted on the progress of your cooking. Not since Fred threw a dinosaur rib on an open fire has outdoor cooking been more appealing!

Smoke Box

If you want a little more smoke and more smoke flavor than you may get with pellets alone, the reinvented Smoke Box lets you cook with wood pellets, wood chunks or chips, and even charcoal. Use the damper to simultaneously control heat and flavor.

Down & Out Ventilation

The Woodwind Pro heat diffuser optimizes your smoking by pushing smoke and heat up the sides of the grill, then circulating and eventually exiting it through the rear exhaust. You will get even heat and smoke throughout the smoking chamber. With the Fan Only mode, you can cold smoke with the Woodwind Pro 36.

WiFi Controller + Camp Chef Connect

The Woodwind Pro WiFi line includes a full-color display with an easy-to-use menu dial, four ports for temperature probes, and a weather-resistant cover. The Camp Chef Connect app lets you monitor your cook from anywhere on your smartphone. You can set timers, check data from past cooks, assign labels to your probes, and set up push notifications. The included Smart Meat Assistant even lets you select meat types. It does not get much easier than this!

Smoke Number

The PID controller helps you regulate smoke and temperature. You can control how much smoke you provide to your cook by adjusting the Smoke Number. The detailed controller gives you the most precise grill temperature control in the industry. Increase the Smoke Number, and your smoke output increases. As the Smoke Number decreases, the temperatures will hold steady. Now you can ask your friends, what is YOUR smoke number?

Stainless Steel Components

Protecting your grill against rust and corrosion helps it last for many years. The Woodwind Pro 36 uses 430 stainless steel on the inside, and the butterfly valve, gasket, and burn cup use 304 stainless steel.

Sidekick Compatible

Expand your outdoor cooking capabilities by adding a Sidekick Flat Top griddle or a Sidekick Searing Station to your pellet grill. A Sidekick mounts easily to your existing side shelf holes. The Sidekick components are propane-powered.

Ash Cleanout

While hardwood pellets typically burn efficiently, they usually leave some ash behind. The Woodwind Pro 36 provides an Ash Cleanout to let you quickly and easily remove ash. Simply pull the Ash Cleanout knob on the side of the grill, and your ash empties into a cup that you can remove. Just dump the ash safely, replace the cup, and you are ready for your next cook!


Camp Chef Woodwind 36 Pro FAQ

Can you grill on a Camp Chef Woodwind Pro 36?

You sure can! The Woodwind 36 Pro reaches a high temperature of 500 degrees F, which is hot enough to sear a steak and grill with no problem. As a bonus, you get real hardwood flavor for delicious results.

How big is the Camp Chef Woodwind 36?

The Woodwind Pro 36 is 62-in wide, 26-in deep, and 44.5-in high. It weighs 220 lbs. The main cooking grid is 34 x 19 inches.

How long is the warranty for the Camp Chef Woodwind 36?

Camp Chef warrants the grill to be free from defects in materials and workmanship for 3 years from the date of purchase. The finish is excluded, as is labor.

products.name: Napoleon 500 Series 4-Burner 32-Inch Built-In Propane Grill - BI32PSS
products.description:
Napoleon Reliability in a Built-in Grill

Napoleon's Built-in 500 Series Propane Grill is designed to install seamlessly into your BBQ island. Made with 304 Stainless Steel, the Built-in 500 grill is durable and stylish, laser-focused on performance.

4 Stainless Steel Burners

Burners are the heart of any gas grill. Napoleon's 16-gauge premium 304 stainless steel burner tubes are reinforced and feature an industry-leading design that provides proven longevity, performance, and efficiency. Complete combustion is the key, and these burners balance fuel and oxygen to generate a clean burn. Dual gas ports on the top and sides of each burner ensure even heating along the burner and produced fewer flare-ups.

Instant JETFIRE Ignition

If a grill doesn't reliably light, it's not a reliable grill. Napoleon's Instant JETFIRE ignition lights the first time, every time. The design sends a jet of flame to light each burner individually. You can light your grill with the twist of your writs. Batteries not required! With cross-lighting burners, in the unlikely event that a burner goes out or fails to light, it automatically relights. There's a cross-light bracket between burners that passes the flame to the unlit burner, assuring safe and reliable grilling.

Dual-Level Stainless Steel Sear Plates

Napoleon's sear plates help create the kind of BBQ flavor you love. When you grill, the plates are heated. As juices and sauces drip onto the plates, the drippings are vaporized to create smoke and steam that bathes the food in flavor. Additionally, the sear plates are staggered on multi-levels, creating even coverage across the grilling surface. This helps ensure even heating throughout your grill.

7.5mm Stainless Steel Iconic Wave Cooking Grids

Never underestimate the power of heavy-duty stainless steel cooking grids! As you can see, the Wave design is like no other, but it's not just because they look cool. The wave encourages even heating and provides more surface area, prevents food from falling through, and keeps the grill cleaner. The shape increases the grates' longevity by allowing for even expansion and contraction, reducing heat and cold's effect on the metal.

Napoleon Built-in 500 Propane Grill FAQ

Can I convert the Built-in 500 propane grill to natural gas?

Napoleon grills are gas specific and shouldn't be modified in any way. Fortunately, we carry the Built-in 500 Natural Gas version!

How big is the Built-in 500 grill?

The Built-in 500 is 33.5-in wide, 27.6-in deep, and 24-in high. It weighs 160 lbs. The main cooking grid is 29.5 x 18 inches, for a main grilling area of 525 square inches. The secondary grilling area totals 261 square inches.

Do I need an insulated grill jacket for the Built-in 500 grill?

The cabinet frame and cabinet MUST be made from non-combustible material! If not, you need to install the grill with the Napoleon Zero Clearance Liner. Note: the item description specifies the 700 Series grill, but Napoleon confirms this liner also works for the Built-in 500.

products.name: Weber Genesis S-435 Propane Gas Grill w/ Sear Zone & Side Burner - Stainless Steel - 36400001
products.description:
Made in the USA with globally-sourced parts

Introducing the newly designed GENESIS E-435 Propane grill - the biggest grilling innovation in decades, that creates a full backyard culinary experience.

Upgraded Sear Zone, Prep & Serve Table, & More

Introducing the newly designed GENESIS E-435 grill that allows you to prep, sear, and serve everything outside, where the party is. The newly designed GENESIS gas grill features our largest and hottest sear zone, with secondary cooking grate so that the main course and sides are all grilled and served at the same time. Once your food is ready, easily transfer it to the large prep & serve table, making for a seamless prep-to-serve grilling experience. The grease management system got a facelift as well: the removable drip pan is now attached to the grease tray for seamless cleanup, with an included scraper just for good measure.

Updated Control Panel: Cleaner Look, Better Precision

Looks aren't everything, but they sure help. The newly designed Weber GENESIS E-435 gas grill sports a revamped control panel, starting with a slight angle for modern aesthetics and ease of use. The burner knobs follow suit, swapping the plastic construction from Weber Genesis II for metallicized knobs that lend a premium feel, not to mention greater durability. As a bonus, each knob is notched with small-spaced tick marks for more precise flame control. That brings us to the T-bar handle, which is shaped for easy gripping, opening, and closing from any angle. And speaking of angles, the T-handle's 90-degree corners enhance the modern look of Weber GENESIS gas grills.

4 Stainless Steel Burners

Get 48,000 BTUs of surface grilling power for a 646 square inch main grilling area. That's big enough to grill 28 burgers at a time!

Side Burner

Saute vegetables, boil corn, or heat up sauces with the 12,000 BTU side burner.

Taller, Bolder Grill Lid

Weber increased the height of these grill lids, a welcome change that goes beyond pure aesthetics. New GENESIS grills can fit rotisseries up to 10 in diameter without removing the top grate. It seems like a small detail, but it's just one more way the next generation of Weber GENESIS grills improve your outdoor cooking experience.

The Ultimate Versatility of WEBER CRAFTED Grillware

At this point, it would be fair to wonder if there was anything the Weber GENESIS E-435 propane grill is incapable of doing. Well, we have some big news on that front: compatibility with WEBER CRAFTED Outdoor Kitchen Collection grillware allows you to cook food never thought possible on a gas grill. Roast, bake, sear, steam, and even stir-fry by simply replacing the standard grate with any of the custom-fit grillware! And with the Weber GENESIS E-435 gas grill, you are already one step closer to the full backyard culinary experience thanks to the frame kit being built in (though the grillware itself is sold separately).

Integrated Grill Locker

A solution to all your grilling storage needs, the grill locker fits WEBER CRAFTED grillware, as well as your large grilling tools

Upgraded Caster Wheels

Weber reimagined everything for the new GENESIS grills, all the way down to the wheels. They've been upgraded to metal, rubber tread casters, as opposed to the pair of plastic locking casters on Genesis II grills. The rubber tread guarantees smooth transport, sturdier materials improve longevity, and the push-down lock mechanism lets you secure your grill in place with minimal effort.

Longer Warranty

Any Weber warranty, coupled with the company's outstanding track record of customer service, brings major peace of mind for backyard grillers. That being said, Weber extended their limited warranty to 12 years on the new GENESIS grills, as opposed to a 10-year period for Genesis II. Now THAT's peace of mind!


Weber GENESIS E-435 FAQ

How big is the Weber GENESIS E-435 gas grill?

The E-435 is 68.5-in wide with both shelves up, 27-in deep, and 48.5-in high. It weighs 220 lbs. The main cooking grid is 34 x 19 inches.

When did the GENESIS E-435 grill come out?

The latest line of GENESIS grills was released early in 2022.

Does the GENESIS line replace the old Genesis II grills?

It does! The Genesis II grills have all been discontinued, and have been replaced by the current line of GENESIS grills.

Can the Weber GENESIS E-435 propane grill be converted to natural gas?

No, but fortunately there's a version of the E-435 for natural gas.

products.description:
Built with quality in mind, the American made Phoenix SD complete outdoor cooking system is easy enough for a beginner to use and has enough features for the serious griller. Built like the renowned Holland Grill, this grill is designed to let you do it all: grill, roast, steam and smoke. Each side of the stainless steel, oval-shaped dual burner is controlled individually and together provides up to 25,000 BTUs of precise heat. The solid brass dual valve allows you to adjust your grill as low as 250 degrees for slow cooking, or turn it up to 500 degrees for high heat grilling. The adjustable vents on the top of the grill allow you to maintain and control the air flow while cooking. For steaming, close the drain valve, fill the cast aluminum drip pan that sits above the burner with liquid of your choice and set the burner to high to steam vegetables or seafood. The heat rises around the drip pan, making it virtually free of flare-ups. With the electric ignition with stainless steel gas collector box, you can easily light the grill using one AAA battery. The stainless steel diamond pattern cooking mesh grid provides 400 square inches of cooking space and prevents food from falling through. The stainless steel grill head has a Sta-Kool swivel, stainless steel handle to open the lid safely and easily and the hood has stainless steel heat indicator to monitor temperatures. The black, powder coated cast aluminum cart includes two stainless steel side shelves with tool hooks and four locking casters. Clean up is easy with the cast aluminum drip pan and collection bucket.

products.description:
Commercial-Style Grill for At-Home Entertainment

The 25-inch Blaze LBM propane grill provides affordable commercial style grills designed with your outdoor BBQ challenges in mind. Grill with confidence behind the power of 3 commercial-grade, 16-gauge 304 stainless steel tube burners that deliver an impressive 14,000 BTUs of cooking performance for a total of 42,000 BTUs. The 8mm stainless steel cooking rods enhance searing capability on a spacious 558 square inches of cooking area, more than enough to feed a crowd of hungry guests. Plus, Blazes Push & Turn flame-thrower ignition ensures a reliable start every time; in the unlikely event it fails, the backup flash tube ignition and crossover channels step up to light the burners so you can grill on.

Comes with 2 Tasty Sides: Cooking Versatility & Incredible Warranties

On other grills, cooking more than one item at a time can be a struggle. That's not the case for the Blaze LBM, which includes heat zone separators that help you create varying levels of heat with each burner. Sear on one side, slow roast on the other, and do everything in between to make sure your guests leave satisfied. Plus, the removable warming rack is an ideal place to keep bread and other food heated while you grill. The stainless steel grill cart features two soft close front doors for storing your tank, grill cover and BBQ accessories. The cart also includes four heavy duty caster wheels, allowing you to relocate the grill easily whenever necessary, and two side shelves for a convenient work area. As far as warranties go, it's hard to beat Blazes usual best-in-class, lifetime warranty but that didn't stop them from tacking on a 3-year, multi-user warranty that covers commercial settings like apartment complexes and condos.

products.name: Cookshack Amerique SM066 Electric Smoker
products.description:
The Cookshack AmeriQue Electric Smoker features stainless steel double walled construction surrounding 850 degree Fahrenheit Spin-Glas insulation, keeping the internal temperatures consistent and the outside cool to the touch. Digital technology allows you to smoke-cook your meat at a temperature and time that you set. The AmeriQue electronic controller has an LED panel that displays the cooking temperature and the remaining time or internal meat temperature. One of the most popular features of this electric smoker is the included meat probe, which allows you to set the desired internal meat temperature. When the meat reaches a pre-set temperature, the smoker automatically goes into a 140 degree hold cycle. The AmeriQue electric smoker will arrive with everything you need to start smoking, including a meat probe for accurate internal temperature, four 18 x 14-inch nickel-plated shelves, two-position side racks, five pounds of hickory wood, stainless steel fire box, four 3-inch locking casters, stainless steel drip pan for easy clean-up, Smoking At Home cookbook with tried-and-true recipes, and an operators manual to get you up to speed fast. This AmeriQue electric smoker has a 50 lb capacity and a temperature range of 140 to 300 degrees. The smoker uses about 1 to 2 ounces of wood for every 60 pounds of food smoked. Each cooking grate has a vertical space of 5 1/2 inches. Smoker requires 7 amps/120V/1000W.

products.description:
Made of cast 304-grade stainless steel with no vulnerable weld spots, the Blaze LTE+ natural gas grill is engineered for whatever challenges the elements (or your menu) can throw at it. The stainless steel grill hood is double lined, shielding the outer layer from heat discoloration while also keeping more heat where it matters most. This LTE+ model also includes a hood assist mechanism that makes opening and closing easier than ever in addition to new, improved lighting, which remains on while in use, and LED illuminated control system with safety glow lighting. All backed by Blaze's best-in-class, lifetime warranty.

Designed to Perform

From startup to sizzle, every aspect of the Blaze LTE grill is optimized for top-level performance. Look no further than the ultra-reliable push-and-turn flame-thrower ignition, which features a backup flashtube and crossover channels system to ensure a steady flame with every start. Blaze's flame-tamer system is just as dependable: it keeps flare-ups in check, helps heat reach every corner of the grilling surface, and instantly vaporizes food drippings into delicious wisps of smoke. With no fear of flare-ups and hot and cold spots a thing of the past, you're free to enjoy grilling in its finest form. Throw in 14,000 BTUs of cooking power from each of the 4 cast stainless steel Linear burners along with patented triangle-shaped searing rods, and you've got a workhorse grill ready to meet every challenge head-on.

New, Innovative Features

Grill at any time with the LTE+ updated LED illuminated control system, a helpful yet stylish touch that makes the grill knobs shine red when in position. Pair that with improved interior lights and you're in for a more enjoyable cooking experience. For added convenience, this Blaze LTE+ grill includes a removable warming rack for toasting buns or keeping cooked food warm until everything is ready to be served. And no need to worry about a mess as the removable, full-width drip tray makes cleanup simple. Add it all up, and this Blaze LTE+ is their best grill yet.

Please note that a 110V power source is required. Blaze LTE+ 4-Burner Gas Grill includes interchangeable propane and natural gas orifices, so if you ever need to switch from one gas to the other, you won't need to acquire a gas conversion kit.

products.description:
Cooking Versatility Even Indoor Ovens Struggle to Match

The Blaze Built-In Propane Outdoor Oven allows you to cook just about anything in your backyard. While it bakes deep-dish, flatbread, or any other pizza style that fits, its built-in vertical rotisserie and dual cooking racks allow you to prepare an impressive variety of dishes. Whether you're slow-cooking a pork butt (the oven can maintain a low temp of 270°F), roasting a ham, baking cookies, or crafting a lasagna, this oven handles it all. From savory dinners to sweet desserts, the Blaze Outdoor Oven transforms your cooking possibilities.

Vertical Rotisserie for Multi-Functional Cooking

Explore new cooking methods with the vertical rotisserie. While a rotisserie chicken is sure to be a hit, the unique vertical design allows you to experiment like never before. Bring the Mediterranean to your backyard with juicy lamb gyros or keep it traditional with a low-and-slow pork butt. No matter what you are cooking though, nestle your vegetables in the included drip pan, and let them soak up all those delicious drippings for the perfect side dish.

From Low-and-Slow to Searing Heat

Tubular burners offer the capability to cook low-and-slow at 270°F or rip as high as 550°F while using the dual cooking racks. That's the kind of oven temperature range that allows for true cooking versatility.

And because the pizza stone is heated directly at the burners, its surface can reach 700°F, which means crispy, restaurant-quality pizza in mere minutes or any other foods that require serious heat.

360-Degree Rotating Pizza Stone

Forget about having to stick your arm into a piping hot oven to twirl your pizza. The 17 ceramic pizza stone rotates at the push of a button, so your family pizza night can truly incorporate the kids. Plus, by evenly distributing the heat from the oven (and eliminating any annoying cold spots), the stone will both ensure total pizza perfection and provide an excellent surface to cook so many other dishes.

Stylish Stainless Steel Construction

Complete your outdoor kitchen and instantly enhance your living space with this sleek design. The Blaze Outdoor Oven is constructed of 304 stainless steel, making it durable, resistant to corrosion, and easy to clean. products.description:
The Blaze LTE+ natural gas grill is made from commercial-grade stainless steel, making it extra tough in outdoor environments. It is also free of vulnerable weld spots, adding to the impressive durability grill masters deserve. The stainless steel grill hood is double lined, shielding the outer layer from heat discoloration while also keeping more heat where it matters most. This LTE+ model also includes a hood assist mechanism that makes opening and closing easier than ever in addition to new, improved lighting, which remains on while in use, and LED illuminated control system with safety glow lighting. All backed by Blaze's best-in-class, lifetime warranty.

Effortless by Design

The Blaze LTE+ makes cooking effortless at every stage. Beginning with startup, thanks to the Blaze push-and-turn flame-thrower ignition system that reliably lights in no time. And just in case, backup flashtube and crossover channels have you covered in the unlikely event of ignition trouble. Either way, the 5 cast stainless steel burners will be lit with impressive quickness, generating 14,000 BTUs apiece for 70,000 BTUs.

Blaze outfitted the LTE+ grill with patented triangular searing rods. Why does that matter? It is all in the design: a wide, flat bottom to soak up vast amounts of heat, along with a pointed top to channel it all to a single point of contact with food. The result is astounding sear marks that you would expect to find in a steakhouse. Beneath the grates rests a set of a full-width, 14-gauge stainless steel flame tamers that not only stop most flare-ups in their tracks, but also evenly distribute heat across the cooking surface. No more dreaded hot or cold spots—just consistent temperatures.

New, Innovative Features

Grill at any time with the LTE+ updated LED illuminated control system, a helpful yet stylish touch that makes the grill knobs shine red when in position. Pair that with improved interior lights and you're in for a more enjoyable cooking experience. For added convenience, this Blaze LTE+ grill includes a removable warming rack for toasting buns or keeping cooked food warm until everything is ready to be served. And no need to worry about a mess as the removable, full-width drip tray makes cleanup simple. Add it all up, and this Blaze LTE+ is their best grill yet.

Please note that a 110V power source is required. Blaze LTE+ 5-Burner Gas Grill includes interchangeable propane and natural gas orifices, so if you ever need to switch from one gas to the other, you won't need to acquire a gas conversion kit.

products.name: TEC Patio FR 26-Inch Built-In Infrared Natural Gas Grill - PFR1NT
products.description:
Newly improved from TEC, the Patio FR series of grills is back and better than ever! Featuring an innovative grilling system capable of cooking from a searing hot 900 degrees Fahrenheit, down to a low 200 degrees, great for low-heat smoking, searing, and everything in between. The TEC Patio FR 26-inch natural gas grill cooks with 100 percent infrared energy with no hot or cold spots, eliminating hot air and reducing moisture loss in food by up to 35 percent. The fuel efficient 30,000 BTU burner uses less fuel than other grills, saving you money on gas. Convenient electronic ignition supplies a reliable spark to ignite the burners safely. TEC uses a patented flare-proof stainless steel infrared burner system combined with a radiant glass emitter panel, resulting in tender, juicy, charbroil flavored food. The position of the stainless steel cooking grates, radiant glass panels, and infrared burners creates even heat distribution across the cooking surface and virtually eliminates flare-ups. The 296 square inch cooking surface is covered by unique, U-shaped cooking grates which heat very quickly, delivering restaurant-style sear marks on your food. TEC Patio grills are capable of heating up to 900 degrees in 10 minutes with the hood closed, making long preheating times are a thing of the past. The need for a side burner is also eliminated because you can place your pots or pans on the cooking grids or radiant panels to heat and cook like on an indoor cooktop. Enjoy quick and easy cleanup, with a self-cleaning cooking surface that incinerates food and debris in 10-15 minutes while the grill is on high. Handcrafted in America, this 26-inch built-in grill features a double-lined hood and thick gauge, 304 grade stainless steel with chrome control knobs. All TEC grills are CSA certified.

products.name: RCS Premier Series 40-Inch 5-Burner Natural Gas Grill With Rear Infrared Burner - RJC40ACK
Blaze LTE+ 40-in 5-Burner Propane Grill w/ Lift-Assist Hood & Rear Infrared Burner
products.description:
The Blaze LTE+ propane grill is made from commercial-grade stainless steel, making it extra tough in outdoor environments. It is also free of vulnerable weld spots, adding to the impressive durability grill masters deserve. The stainless steel grill hood is double lined, shielding the outer layer from heat discoloration while also keeping more heat where it matters most. This LTE+ model also includes a hood assist mechanism that makes opening and closing easier than ever in addition to new, improved lighting, which remains on while in use, and LED illuminated control system with safety glow lighting. The stainless steel grill cart features two soft close front doors for storing your tank, grill cover and BBQ accessories. The cart also includes four heavy duty caster wheels, allowing you to relocate the grill easily whenever necessary, and two side shelves for a convenient work area. All backed by Blaze's best-in-class, lifetime warranty.

Effortless by Design

The Blaze LTE+ makes cooking effortless at every stage. Beginning with startup, thanks to the Blaze push-and-turn flame-thrower ignition system that reliably lights in no time. And just in case, backup flashtube and crossover channels have you covered in the unlikely event of ignition trouble. Either way, the 5 cast stainless steel burners will be lit with impressive quickness, generating 14,000 BTUs apiece for 70,000 BTUs.

Blaze outfitted the LTE+ grill with patented triangular searing rods. Why does that matter? It is all in the design: a wide, flat bottom to soak up vast amounts of heat, along with a pointed top to channel it all to a single point of contact with food. The result is astounding sear marks that you would expect to find in a steakhouse. Beneath the grates rests a set of a full-width, 14-gauge stainless steel flame tamers that not only stop most flare-ups in their tracks, but also evenly distribute heat across the cooking surface. No more dreaded hot or cold spots—just consistent temperatures.

New, Innovative Features

Grill at any time with the LTE+ updated LED illuminated control system, a helpful yet stylish touch that makes the grill knobs shine red when in position. Pair that with improved interior lights and you're in for a more enjoyable cooking experience. For added convenience, this Blaze LTE+ grill includes a removable warming rack for toasting buns or keeping cooked food warm until everything is ready to be served. And no need to worry about a mess as the removable, full-width drip tray makes cleanup simple. Add it all up, and this Blaze LTE+ is their best grill yet.

Please note that a 110V power source is required. Blaze LTE+ 5-Burner Gas Grill includes interchangeable propane and natural gas orifices, so if you ever need to switch from one gas to the other, you won't need to acquire a gas conversion kit.

products.name: Blaze LTE PRO 32-in 4-Burner Built-In Natural Gas Grill w/ Digital Temperature Screen & Rotisserie - BLZ-4LTEPRO-NG
products.description:
Blaze LTE PRO: Redefining Excellence in Gas Grills

The LTE PRO rises above the competition with an updated suite of innovative, advanced features that place it firmly at the top of Blaze's collection of natural gas grills. It's ready to meet any challenge with thicker cooking grates, a digital control panel, more accurate temperature readouts, rotisserie kit, and an incredibly useful warming rack that does much more than warm. These features only scratch the surface of what an incredible grill the LTE PRO is.

Like all Blaze gas grills, it's made of 304 stainless steel down to the cast stainless steel burners for impressive durability, a double-lined hood to prevent discoloration, and a reliable flame-thrower ignition.

Flexibility to cook any kind of food with four cooking zones. The four main natural gas burners each provide up to 14,000 BTUs of efficient grilling power, with an additional 10,000 BTUs from the rear burner, which is primarily for rotisserie use but can be used for warming.

The Blaze LTE PRO has upgraded features that set it apart from the competition:

Spring-Assist Hood for Effortless Opening and Closing

The hood has an ergonomic rotating, knurled H handle, and combined with spring assistance you'll find it's practically effortless to open and close the lid.

Increased Hood Clearance for Larger Cuts of Meat

Fit taller & larger items on the grill. In addition to more room for rotisserie cooking, the increased headroom allows for larger roasts - there's even enough room for a whole turkey!

12 mm Hexagonal Grill Grates Intensify Searing

If you haven't converted your life to the metric system yet, 12 mm is almost 1/2 an inch! These grill grates are solid, cast stainless steel and offer superior heat retention to deliver steakhouse-level searing.

Digital Control Panel with Temperature Readings

The new digital screen displays accurate temperature operation for easy monitoring and control. The thermocouple is directly below the grill grates, which is significantly more accurate than hood thermometers. Two meat probes are included, and those temps will also be displayed on the digital panel.

A Warming Rack That Does More Than Just Warm

The much-improved warming rack features specialized holders for specific foods like tacos and chicken legs and includes stow-n-go capability to store your warming rack upright when not in use.

Interior and Knob Lights for Convenience and Safety

You'll enjoy the peace of mind that comes with the illuminated control system featuring safety glow LED lights with white temperature indicators that shine red when gas is flowing. In addition, the interior lighting helps you see how your cook is going after the sun goes down.

Blaze Lifetime Warranty = Peace of Mind

The LTE PRO includes Blaze's best-in-class, lifetime warranty, so you can buy with confidence, knowing that it will last. The grill includes interchangeable propane and natural gas orifices, so switching from one gas to the other is quick and easy, and won't require a separate gas conversion kit. Please note that 110 volts are required to use the lights and digital screen, but they are not needed to operate your grill's burners.

Blaze LTE+ Marine Grade 32-Inch 4-Burner Built-In Propane Gas Grill w/ Lift-Assist Hood & Rear Infrared Burner - BLZ-4LTE3MG-LP
products.description:
The Blaze LTE+ product line introduces a commercial grade multi-user grill that is designed with coastal cooking challenges in mind. The Blaze LTE+ 32-inch Marine Grade built-in propane grill includes a new and improved features, plus a 316L stainless steel construction ideal for saltwater environments. It is also free of vulnerable weld spots, adding to the impressive durability grill masters deserve. The stainless steel grill hood is double lined, shielding the outer layer from heat discoloration while also keeping more heat where it matters most. This LTE+ model also includes a hood assist mechanism that makes opening and closing easier than ever in addition to new, improved lighting, which remains on while in use, and LED illuminated control system with safety glow lighting. All backed by Blaze's best-in-class, lifetime warranty.

Effortless by Design

The marine grade Blaze LTE+ makes cooking effortless at every stage. Beginning with startup, thanks to the Blaze push-and-turn flame-thrower ignition system that reliably lights in no time. And just in case, backup flashtube and crossover channels have you covered in the unlikely event of ignition trouble. Either way, the 4 cast stainless steel burners will be lit with impressive quickness, generating 14,000 BTUs apiece for 56,000 BTUs.

Blaze outfitted the LTE+ marine grade grill with patented triangular searing rods. Why does that matter? It is all in the design: a wide, flat bottom to soak up vast amounts of heat, along with a pointed top to channel it all to a single point of contact with food. The result is astounding sear marks that you would expect to find in a steakhouse. Beneath the grates rests a set of a full-width, 14-gauge stainless steel flame tamers that not only stop most flare-ups in their tracks, but also evenly distribute heat across the cooking surface. No more dreaded hot or cold spots—just consistent temperatures.

New, Innovative Features

Grill at any time with the LTE+ updated LED illuminated control system, a helpful yet stylish touch that makes the grill knobs shine red when in position. Pair that with improved interior lights and you're in for a more enjoyable cooking experience. For added convenience, this Blaze LTE+ grill includes a removable warming rack for toasting buns or keeping cooked food warm until everything is ready to be served. And no need to worry about a mess as the removable, full-width drip tray makes cleanup simple. Add it all up, and this marine grade Blaze LTE+ is their best grill yet.

Please note that a 110V power source is required. Blaze LTE+ Marine Grade Gas Grill includes interchangeable propane and natural gas orifices, so if you ever need to switch from one gas to the other, you won't need to acquire a gas conversion kit.

products.name: Blaze Professional LUX 34-in 3-Burner Built-In Propane Grill w/ Rotisserie - BLZ-3PRO-LP
products.description:
Blaze Professional LUX Delivers Commercial-Grade Power & Performance

Get superior performance from Start to Come-and-Get-It! Our friends at Blaze would not call a grill professional if they didn't mean it. The Blaze Professional LUX 3-burner propane grill lives up to its billing on all fronts, starting with commercial-grade stainless steel construction across the board. Its three 304 cast stainless steel burners are produced in the signature H style, giving them a heavy-duty feel to match their unquestionable durability and 18,000 BTUs each.

Steakhouse-level Sear Marks and Minimal Flare-ups

Above the burners rests 12mm-thick stainless steel hexagon-shaped grill grates that provide maximum heat retention in service of staggering sear marks. With 12-gauge flame tamer grids thrown into the mix to minimize flare-ups, this built-in Blaze propane grill has all the makings of a luxury experience.

Easy to Fire Up and Adjust

Startup is just as effortless as cooking, with a Push & Turn Flame-Thrower ignition system for steady, reliable flames at the turn of a knob. The Backup Flashtube & Crossover Channels, meanwhile, function as secondary ignitors so you will never be left without a flame. Heat zone separators border each burner, establishing distinct cooking zones to improve cooking versatility like never before. Add it all up, and you will produce professional-level results time after time.

Yes, Luxury Grilling is an Actual Thing

Every aspect of the Blaze Professional LUX built-in 3-burner grill is designed with a luxury experience in mind. Take its internal halogen lights, for instance: they shine brightly so you can grill boldly, even after the sun has set. Blaze's signature red LED Illuminated Control System pitches in during nighttime grilling as well, while also adding a subtle sense of style to the proceedings. And if style is indeed what you are after, the Blaze Professional LUX stainless steel grill hood features a sleek, contoured edge - along with a double lining that wards off heat discoloration to maintain a brand-new look no matter how often you grill.

Sophisticated Design Meets Practicality

When it comes to convenience, good luck finding a spot where it was not considered. Cleanup is as smooth as the grill's design thanks to a full-width drip pan on rollers. The built-in rear infrared burner awaits your slow-roasting recipes, and the waterproof rotisserie kit can be stored on included hanging hooks when not in use. The 615 square inches of total grilling space gives you plenty of room to play, and with a best-in-class, lifetime warranty you can grill without worry. Professional, indeed!

CSA Certified to the following Standard:
CSA/AM ANSI Z21.58-2018/CSA 1.6-2018 (Fifth Edition) - Outdoor cooking gas appliances

products.name: Blaze LTE PRO 40-in 5-Burner Built-In Natural Gas Grill w/ Digital Temperature Screen & Rotisserie - BLZ-5LTEPRO-NG
products.description:
Blaze LTE PRO: Redefining Excellence in Gas Grills

The LTE PRO rises above the competition with an updated suite of innovative, advanced features that place it firmly at the top of Blaze's collection of natural gas grills. It's ready to meet any challenge with thicker cooking grates, a digital control panel, more accurate temperature readouts, rotisserie kit, and an incredibly useful warming rack that does much more than warm. These features only scratch the surface of what an incredible grill the LTE PRO is.

Like all Blaze gas grills, it's made of 304 stainless steel down to the cast stainless steel burners for impressive durability, a double-lined hood to prevent discoloration, and a reliable flame-thrower ignition.

Flexibility to cook any kind of food with five cooking zones. The five main natural gas burners each provide 14,000 BTUs of efficient grilling power, with an additional 10,000 BTUs from the rear burner, which is primarily for rotisserie use but can be used for warming.

The Blaze LTE PRO has upgraded features that set it apart from the competition:

Spring-Assist Hood for Effortless Opening and Closing

The hood has an ergonomic rotating, knurled H handle, and combined with spring assistance you'll find it's practically effortless to open and close the lid.

Increased Hood Clearance for Larger Cuts of Meat

Fit taller & larger items on the grill. In addition to more room for rotisserie cooking, the increased headroom allows for larger roasts - there's even enough room for a whole turkey!

12 mm Hexagonal Grill Grates Intensify Searing

If you haven't converted your life to the metric system yet, 12 mm is almost 1/2 an inch! These grill grates are solid, cast stainless steel and offer superior heat retention to deliver steakhouse-level searing.

Digital Control Panel with Temperature Readings

The new digital screen displays accurate temperature operation for easy monitoring and control. The thermocouple is directly below the grill grates, which is significantly more accurate than hood thermometers. Two meat probes are included, and those temps will also be displayed on the digital panel.

A Warming Rack That Does More Than Just Warm

The much-improved warming rack features specialized holders for specific foods like tacos and chicken legs and includes stow-n-go capability to store your warming rack upright when not in use.

Interior and Knob Lights for Convenience and Safety

You'll enjoy the peace of mind that comes with the illuminated control system featuring safety glow LED lights with white temperature indicators that shine red when gas is flowing. In addition, the interior lighting helps you see how your cook is going after the sun goes down.

Blaze Lifetime Warranty = Peace of Mind

The LTE PRO includes Blaze's best-in-class, lifetime warranty, so you can buy with confidence, knowing that it will last. The grill includes interchangeable propane and natural gas orifices, so switching from one gas to the other is quick and easy, and won't require a separate gas conversion kit. Please note that 110 volts are required to use the lights and digital screen, but they are not needed to operate your grill's burners.

Grill with confidence at any level and enjoy professional grade results with SABER gas grills. The patented SABER infrared cooking system allows you to cook up juicier and more flavorful meals than traditional systems that use dry convection air. The unique SABER cooking grates and infrared emitters prevent flare-ups and direct airflow away from the cooking surface, providing evenly distributed, indirect heat for maximum moisture retention while grilling. The cooking grates also catch any drippings and debris, protecting the burners and creating that familiar BBQ sizzle as foods are infused with more juicy flavor. Designed with fuel efficiency in mind, the SABER infrared cooking system delivers quality results faster than most gas grills while consuming 30-percent less fuel. The burners, emitters and grates are made of 304 commercial grade stainless steel, ensuring long-lasting performance in your outdoor kitchen. The SABER Elite 1500 32-inch propane gas grill features an all-304-grade stainless steel lid with mirror-polished edges and two internal halogen lights for night-time grilling. Three 8,000 BTU gas burners, provide evenly-distributed heat across a 500 square-inch cooking surface. An adjustable, stainless steel warming rack folds down to keep foods warm and can be folded away for additional space when using the inlcuded stainless steel rotisserie spit motor and spit rod. Precisely manage grilling temperatures across three cooking zones using individual LED illuminated burner control knobs, ensuring reliable start-up with integrated push-button electronic ignition. Three grate-level temperature gauges with annealed stainless steel bezels allow you to easily monitor grilling temperatures, even while the lid is lifted. Two 304-grade stainless steel side shelves provide convenient workspace with die-cast BBQ tool holders and a towel bar, as well as an integrated side-burner in the left shelf. The 18,000 BTU double ring side burner features dual control knobs so you can use a single burner ring for simmering, or crank up both burners to boil 15-quarts of water in as little as 18 minutes. Cleaning your SABER grill after meals is easy thanks to the 304 stainless steel burner boxes, firebox liners and front-access grease tray, simply burn off and brush away any remaining debris with the included grate scraper. The SABER EZ assembly cart features fully-enclosed, 304-grade stainless steel storage space with a condiment basket, stainless steel access doors with a roll-out tank tray and heavy-duty, nylon locking casters for easy placement. products.name: Napoleon Prestige PRO 825 5-Burner Built-in Propane Grill w/ Rotisserie & Power Burner - BIPRO825RBIPSS-3
products.description:
The Napoleon Prestige PRO 825 combines the power of infrared grilling and the Napoleon stainless steel cooking system in one grill. This built-in propane gas grill has a twin head cooking system for more grilling versatility. Sear the perfect steak using the infrared burner while you bake a cake on the conventional side. One side has four stainless steel tube burners that provide up to 48,000 BTUs of cooking power while the other side has two ceramic infrared burners that produce 24,000 BTUs, reaching high heat in seconds, and ideal for searing restaurant quality steaks. The two infrared burners have an 8,000 BTU stainless steel tube warming burner between them. The grill has stainless steel cooking grates with 825 square inches of main cooking area and 420 square inches across the stainless steel warming area for a total of 1245 square inches of cooking area. Easily turn the burners on with a flame thrower ignition for a reliable start up. The stainless steel wave cooking grids create the trademark Napoleon sear lines. The stainless steel, self-cleaning sear plates vaporize drippings, control flare ups and keep your food moist. The Prestige PRO 825 also has an 18,000 BTU stainless steel rear infrared burner for slow cooking with the rotisserie kit. An integrated wood chip smoker tray pulls out for easy filling and has a dedicated 8,000 BTU burner that creates delicious smoke flavor. The hood features an Accu-Probe temperature gauge, stainless steel end caps and retains heat for oven-like performance. The LED Spectrum Night Light control knobs have near limitless color options making your night time entertaining a breeze, and they glow red when a burner is in use while two interior lights illuminate the grilling surface. Clean up is a cinch with the full width removable drip pan. This Napoleon grill is manufactured in Canada.

products.name: Fire Magic Choice Multi-User Accessible CMA430S 24-Inch Natural Gas Grill With Analog Thermometer On In-Ground Post - CMA430S-RT1N-G6
products.description:
Known for crafting American-made premium grills for over 75 years, Fire Magic is dedicated to providing you with a quality outdoor cooking experience. Choice Series grills are the most affordable line that Fire Magic offers, featuring superior design and materials inside Aurora-style housing. In addition to the standard premium features, the new Multi-User Accessible collection of Choice series grill includes several features designed to withstand frequent use in areas like resorts and condos. They also feature a suite of enhancements designed to assist individuals with disabilities. The CMA430S freestanding natural gas grill is constructed of 304 stainless steel for long lasting quality, with a satin finish and comfort touch knobs on a sleek and simple control panel. The modified control knobs are easier to manipulate and are made with locking pins as an anti-theft measure. As an accessibility upgrade, the hood is spring assisted, and includes a handle on the side for easy opening and closing. Integrated into the hood are a wind guard to prevent airflow into the exhaust vent, and an analog thermometer with an angled bezel for easier viewing. Inside, two 16-gauge stainless steel tubular burners provide 46,000 BTUs. These burners are lit by reliable Rapid Light ignition that requires no battery or external power. Flavor grids protect the burners from grease and debris, while also spreading heat evenly to the cooking surface. The 432 sq. inch cooking surface is comprised of patented Diamond Sear cooking grids, which feature a trapezoidal shape that optimally transfers heat from the fire to your food. They are locked into place by the face panel to prevent theft. An adjustable warming rack adds extra space for keeping food hot, and is also locked for theft prevention. The disposable drip pan system makes cleanup easy. Raised hangers line the sides and back of the grill for seamless built-in installation. The grill is mounted to a sturdy in-ground post, perfect for permanent installation in courtyard or outdoor gathering space. For the Accessible collection, the grill is lower on the post mount than on normal Choice grills, with the cooking surface sitting at 32 inches high instead of 37. As an added safety feature, this unit includes a 1-hour automatic gas shut-off timer. This is perfect for common use areas where users might forget to shut off the burners. In addition, the operating instructions for the grill are laser etched onto the control panel face so that they can never be misplaced. All of these design enhancements back up a strong 5 year limited warranty. Designed with frequent use and abuse in mind, and with enhanced accessibility, the Choice Multi-User Accessible collection of grills from Fire Magic is the perfect luxury option for any common use area.
